mapper.sql: ID = #{id}, BUSINESSID = #{businessid}, APPLYID = #{applyid}, BILL_NO = #{billNo}, CONTRACT_NO = #{contractNo}, LOAN_NO = #{loanNo}, CUSTOM_CODE = #{customCode}, CUSTOM_NAME = #{customName}, CUSTOM_ID_TYPE = #{customIdType}, CUSTOM_ID_CARD = #{customIdCard}, COMPANY = #{company}, BRANDS_CODE = #{brandsCode}, BRANDS_NAME = #{brandsName}, SERIES_CODE = #{seriesCode}, SERIES_NAME = #{seriesName}, CAR_BRAND_TYPE = #{carBrandType}, CAR_BRAND_TYPE_NAME = #{carBrandTypeName}, CAR_PRICE = #{carPrice}, CAR_MORTGAGER_NAME = #{carMortgagerName}, NACTIVITIES_ID = #{nactivitiesId}, NACTIVITIES_NAME = #{nactivitiesName}, NECACTIVITIES_ID = #{necactivitiesId}, NECACTIVITIES_NAME = #{necactivitiesName}, NBIZ_TYPE = #{nbizType}, NBIZ_TYPE_NAME = #{nbizTypeName}, NGETINTEREST_TYPE = #{ngetinterestType}, NGETINTEREST_TYPE_NAME = #{ngetinterestTypeName}, NDLRBIZ_TYPE = #{ndlrbizType}, NDLRBIZ_TYPE_NAME = #{ndlrbizTypeName}, NLOAN_MONEY = #{nloanMoney}, TIME_LIMIT = #{timeLimit}, DAPPLY_DATE = #{dapplyDate}, DFACTSTART_DATE = #{dfactstartDate}, NECLOAN_MONEY = #{necloanMoney}, FIRST_RATIO = #{firstRatio}, LARGE_AREA_CODE = #{largeAreaCode}, LARGE_AREA_NAME = #{largeAreaName}, ZONE_TWO_CODE = #{zoneTwoCode}, ZONE_TWO_NAME = #{zoneTwoName}, DISTRIBUTOR_CODE = #{distributorCode}, DISTRIBUTOR_NAME = #{distributorName}, SALES_PERSON_CODE = #{salesPersonCode}, SALES_PERSON_NAME = #{salesPersonName}, PROVINCE_CODE = #{provinceCode}, PROVINCE_NAME = #{provinceName}, CITY_CODE = #{cityCode}, CITY_NAME = #{cityName}, REMARK = #{remark}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime}, START_TIME = #{startTime}, CREATOR = #{creator}, MODIFIER = #{modifier}, ACTIVEMATCHFLAG = #{activematchflag}, PLANMATCHFLAG = #{planmatchflag}, FLAG = #{flag}, PERSON_CODE = #{personCode}, PERSON_NAME = #{personName}, TEAM_NAME = #{teamName}, TEAM_CODE = #{teamCode}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, BUSINESSID, APPLYID, BILL_NO, CONTRACT_NO, LOAN_NO, CUSTOM_CODE, CUSTOM_NAME, CUSTOM_ID_TYPE, CUSTOM_ID_CARD, COMPANY, BRANDS_CODE, BRANDS_NAME, SERIES_CODE, SERIES_NAME, CAR_BRAND_TYPE, CAR_BRAND_TYPE_NAME, CAR_PRICE, CAR_MORTGAGER_NAME, NACTIVITIES_ID, NACTIVITIES_NAME, NECACTIVITIES_ID, NECACTIVITIES_NAME, NBIZ_TYPE, NBIZ_TYPE_NAME, NGETINTEREST_TYPE, NGETINTEREST_TYPE_NAME, NDLRBIZ_TYPE, NDLRBIZ_TYPE_NAME, NLOAN_MONEY, TIME_LIMIT, DAPPLY_DATE, DFACTSTART_DATE, NECLOAN_MONEY, FIRST_RATIO, LARGE_AREA_CODE, LARGE_AREA_NAME, ZONE_TWO_CODE, ZONE_TWO_NAME, DISTRIBUTOR_CODE, DISTRIBUTOR_NAME, SALES_PERSON_CODE, SALES_PERSON_NAME, PROVINCE_CODE, PROVINCE_NAME, CITY_CODE, CITY_NAME, REMARK, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, START_TIME, CREATOR, MODIFIER, ACTIVEMATCHFLAG, PLANMATCHFLAG, FLAG, PERSON_CODE, PERSON_NAME, TEAM_NAME, TEAM_CODE FROM MKMM_BASIC_BUSSINESS
mapper.delete:
